title: Intelligent Design - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/2/20
itunes:title: Intelligent Design - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/2/20
description:
George Noory and Dr. Geoffrey Simmons explore his research into intelligent design, why he gave up his previously held beliefs about Darwinism and evolution, and how robotics and medical advances could lead to the next step of human development.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
